description: Calculates a round buffer around each geometry given. Buffers can be applied to points, lines and polygons, but the results are always polygons. Multi-part types (e.g. `MultiPoint`) are also allowed.

parameters.name: geometries
parameters.description:
Geometries to apply the buffer on.

To maximize interoperability, a nested `GeometryCollection` should be avoided. Furthermore, a `GeometryCollection` composed of a single type of geometries should be avoided in favour of the corresponding multi-part type (e.g. `MultiPolygon`).

parameters.name: distance
parameters.description: The radius of the buffer in the unit given in the `unit` parameter. A negative number can be provided to subtract from geometries.

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: The unit the distance is given in, either in the unit of the spatial reference system (`null`, the default value) or in meters (`m`).

returns.description: Returns a vector data cube with the computed new geometries.
